3.caption_en: Promotional slide presenting free "Core Tools" (left) and paid "Advanced Tools" (right). The free set offers >25 canvases and an online user guide, while the paid set includes a playbook, additional tool files, one-year knowledge library access and discount codes — download requires registration.
